description.en:
The four Sakimiya sisters all have their own love lives to deal with when it comes to being in love with other women. The eldest Ryou is dating her student Hikari, the second sister Serina has feelings for one of her coworkers, the third sister Yuika likes her childhood friend Miu, and the fourth sister Mizuki is going out with Tachibana, an older girl on the basketball team.

[b][u]Portuguese / Português[/u][/b][spoiler]
As quatro irmãs Sakimiya têm suas próprias vidas amorosas para lidar quando se trata de estar apaixonada por outras mulheres. A mais velha Ryou está namorando sua aluna Hikari, a segunda irmã Serina tem sentimentos por uma de suas colegas, a terceira irmã gosta de sua amiga de infância Miu, e a quarta irmã Mizuki está saindo com Tachibana, sua companheira de time de basquete.[/spoiler]

[b][u]Bahasa Indonesia[/u][/b]
[spoiler]
Keempat saudari perempuan Sakimiya semuanya memiliki kehidupan cinta mereka sendiri yang harus dihadapi ketika harus jatuh cinta dengan wanita lain. Yang tertua Ryou berpacaran dengan muridnya Hikari, saudari perempuan kedua Serina memiliki perasaan terhadap salah satu rekan kerjanya, saudari perempuan ketiga Yuika menyukai teman masa kecilnya Miu, dan saudari perempuan keempat Mizuki berpacaran dengan Tachibana, seorang gadis yang lebih tua di tim bola basket.[/spoiler]
